data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Barbuda unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Barbuda, Antigua and Barbuda
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Barbuda that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 347 believers in Barbuda to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Barbuda, Antigua and Barbuda. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Codrington
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Codrington, Barbuda, Antigua and Barbuda.
Father, bring yourself glory in Barbuda. Through your servants plant 2 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 347 believers in Barbuda, Antigua and Barbuda a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Barbuda prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.
